text: Franck Rizzetto (born 29 March 1971) is a French former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Toulouse Fontaines Club players Category:Montpellier HSC players Category:Olympique Alès players Category:FC Metz players Category:Nîmes Olympique players Category:AS Cannes players Category:Rodez AF players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Rodez AF managers Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:French football managers Category:Paris Saint-Germain F.C. non-playing staff
title: Franck Rizzetto
